useCase.name: Archive Inventory Upload

successEndConditions.condition: Upload and archival process completed successfully

useCase.trigger: User wants to upload inventory files for archival

mainSequence.step: Archivist signs in to the system
Authentication System verifies credentials and confirms success
Archivist provides metadata for the files
Archivist defines access rights for the files
Upload Interface saves metadata and access rights
File Storage stores files in the archive
Upload Interface updates the inventory list
Upload Interface displays upload success message
Notification System sends notification to donor representatives
